input.sentences: this family marched in the annual peace walk .
there were people of different races there .
some carried the banner | while others carried signs .
many people wanted to bring attention to recent events involving race and the police .
output.sentences: Today I took pictures of this peaceful marched walk.
There were all kinds of races with alot of people.
A lot of them carried signs and banners.
There were a lot of represented generations.
A lot of police were there to make sure that they were safe.
